summary: Diff implements in-app video recording (MediaRecorder hook + camera UI mode toggle), IndexedDB persistence for videos with storage size updates, gallery listing/playback/export/delete for videos alongside photos, and updated Help modal copy. Diff also introduces unrelated photo editing/beauty/mask enhancements not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded photo editor features (Beauty tab with smoothing/whitening, and mask overlay controls) not requested in REQ-20..REQ-23.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is video recording/persistence/gallery/help updates; it explicitly lists video editing as a non-goal and does not request new photo editor capabilities.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (EditorScreen described as including new Beauty tab and mask overlay controls)
frontend/src/App.tsx (Photo type includes new beauty and mask fields)

hallucinated_features.description: Added React Query backend integration hooks placeholder (useQueries) unrelated to video recording/persistence/gallery/help requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify staying browser-based for persistence and do not request new backend integration work for this change.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": React Query hooks for backend integration (placeholder for future metadata sync))
